subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kris Humphries had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and the Nets overcame an injury to the All-Star guard Deron Williams on Friday night to defeat the host Charlotte Bobcats, 83-74.
snippet: Kris Humphries had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and the Nets overcame an injury to the All-Star guard Deron Williams on Friday night to defeat the host Charlotte Bobcats, 83-74.
